description: This file defines an authentication context and provider for a React application, managing user sessions, roles, and team selections via Supabase and local storage. It includes hooks, context, and functions for role inference, session management, and team persistence.

methods.name: useAuth
methods.description: React hook to access the AuthContext.

methods.name: deriveRoleFromUser
methods.description: Infers user role from user object or fallback heuristics based on email or metadata.

methods.name: AuthProvider
methods.description: React component that provides authentication state, role, team info, and actions via context, managing session initialization, role and team resolution, and auth state changes.
